tool_description: Competitions, Matches for the Asian Bookmaker 198bet.
name: 198BET
title: 198BET

api_list.name: Matches (early)
api_list.description: Use the sport from the "sports" endpoint to receive Matches from 198bet Sportsbook.

api_list.name: Odds
api_list.description: Use the eventid (e.g. "FBL-941185") from the "Matches" endpoint to receive Odds from 198bet Sportsbook.

api_list.name: Matches (live)
api_list.description: Use the sport from the "sports" endpoint to receive Matches from 198bet Sportsbook.

api_list.name: Sports
api_list.description: Retrieves all available sports needed for the endpoints.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://198bet.p.rapidapi.com/198bet/sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "198bet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://198bet.p.rapidapi.com/198bet/sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "198bet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
